snippet: Mr. Kutcher has been involved with marketing Popchips since he was named the brand's "president of pop culture" in 2010. In a new campaign, he adopts four personas.
abstract: Mr. Kutcher has been involved with marketing Popchips since he was named the brand's "president of pop culture" in 2010. In a new campaign, he adopts four personas.

headline.main: Ashton Kutcher Shows Many Faces in Popchips Ad Campaign
